message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.ActorRef' import. Should be before 'sample.cluster.transformation.TransformationMessages.TransformationJob'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.Terminated' import. Should be before 'sample.cluster.transformation.TransformationMessages.TransformationJob'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.AbstractActor' import. Should be before 'sample.cluster.transformation.TransformationMessages.TransformationJob'.
'sender' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be 12.
